setup:
Set up the enemy as follows.
Type: Other
Animation: 2-Frame, 3-Frame, 4-Frame, Flip, or None
Spawn Animation: Instant
Step Speed is used
Attribute 11: GH_INVISIBLE_COMBO or GH_INVISIBLE_ALT (normallly -1)
Attribute 12: Script slot
